summary: Redesign of Honeyside to be on par with other houses in terms of storage without overpowering it. Includes changes to architecture aswell.
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]HrqXXkNcfvc[/youtube][/center]

Warning! \"Ghost\" objects may appear if you brought Honeyside before activating this mod. They can be deleted in console by using \"markfordelete\" console command. If anyone knows how to fix this i would greatly appreciate help.

Download this mod at your own risk!

Update: Added version with alot more bookspace in which housecarl also stays in her room. 
-----------------------------------------------------
This mod is for those that were bothered with the fact, that Honeyside has pretty much least storage in terms of player housing.

In my personal opinion this does in no way overpower the house. The house is of course upgradeable, you do not get everything from the start.

Another important change is redesign of basement so it is no longer bigger than the actual house or having bigger dimensions than on the outside.
-----------------------------------------------------
List of changes:

-Added 3 storage chests, one in the storage area by the stairs and chests for enchanting and alchemy near the respective workstations.
-Added another bookcase.
-Added door between the staircase and bedroom.
-Removed most of the hunting trophies, they made the place look smaller than it is. And i hate those.
-Remade the basement level, removed the housecarl room which is now in the former enchanting room, which is cut in half and separated by door from the rest of basement.
-Moved most things from enchanting room to the alchemy room.
-(Optional alternative file) House carl now sits in her room in the basement
-I Stole all the sweet rolls
----------------------------------------------------
Warning!

If you have already moved in to the house before installing this mod, remember to clean up non-static items from the changed areas.
----------------------------------------------------
Installation

Extract the TheClone Honeyside.esp from the zip and move the file to your ...Skyrim/Data/ folder. Make sure the mod is allowed in the launcher, when you select Data files.
----------------------------------------------------
If you like the redesign, be sure to check out my other mod, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9600]Shorter Breezehome[/url].
I might make other redesigns in the future these redesigns were made for myself first.
Feel free to use the redesigns anywhere you want, just list me as the author.
author: TheClone

files.name: TheClone Honeyside - House carl in basement
